page.title: 08HOUSING AND ENERGY
page.content: In & around Icomb there are 7 terraed houses,26 detached,13 semi-detached,8 farms,4 bungalows & 1 church.In Icomb detached are the most popular kind of house.We found out from questinares that we took around Icomb that most of the houses are made of cotswold stone. Cotswold stone is a kind of creamy colour. The rooves are made of stone & tile.Icomb has pretty houses. In Icomb they use electricity for central heating,oil,coal fire,wood bunner,ray burn,open fires, solid fuel,night storage,calor gas. No gas in Icomb comes from the North sea.
